page.title: 11CHILDREN - BROCKWORTH AREA
page.content: Some 11 year olds revealed that on average they watched 5 hours of TV a day;listened to 1 hour of music;read for half an hour whilst sport was played mostly at school.Homework was often hated as-"I usually ended up missing programmes on TV". But another boy's {hobby} was writing; he described our area-"I remember the sound of swallows migrating,screaming in deafening cries.Of angry drivers hooting in busy traffic queues.Of thunder rumbling.And chalk on board on classroom wall.I remember the feel of a friendly handshake.Of old yellowed paper and book covers.Of butterfly wings.I remember the smell of burning wood billowing up into the cool evening air.Of the earth after an erratic storm of wandering wind and rain.Of freshly cut grass and of the pungent compost heap".
